creator: ricardo.gladwell@btinternet.com
text:
The 2.1 beta 1 JARs have not been uploaded to the remote maven repository at:

http://www.ibiblio.org/maven/slide/jars/

creator: masonjm@ah.org
text:
Any idea who is responsible for maintaining that repository? I'll upload them if
someone can point me in the right direction.

creator: ricardo.gladwell@btinternet.com
text:
I believe the following page details how to upload JARs to the ibiblio maven
repository:

http://maven.apache.org/repository-upload.html

Hmm... that's a little more involved than I had anticipated.

I have somewhere right around *zero* experience with Maven, so some of those
instructions are a bit hard to follow :). Any chance you could provide the
project.xml file, or at least a template I could fill out? I think I can handle
the rest of it.
creator: masonjm@ah.org
ricardo.gladwell@btinternet.com
text:
Created attachment 12534
Template Maven POM for slide sub-project.

creator: ricardo.gladwell@btinternet.com
text:
Please find a sample project.xml attached. I think you will need to create a
project.xml for each target JAR you are contributing. You will also need to
create a full list of dependencies for each target. I have included a sample
dependency (commons-logging) to demonstrate. I hope this is helpful :)

*bump* Sorry, but I notice there hasn't been any progress on this bug. I've
added templates for project.xml files for doing this and included a reference,
but someone from the slide team needs to update the dependencies so that
external, maven developers can start building and testing against the latest
beta releases.
creator: ricardo.gladwell@btinternet.com

text: Slide 2.1 final is in the maven repositories
creator: mvdb@apache.org
